seo.whatIsTitle: What is AI chat and how does it work?
seo.whatIsContent: **AI chat** refers to **conversational artificial intelligence** that uses **Large Language Models (LLMs)** to understand and generate **human-like responses** to text inputs. These systems are trained on **massive datasets** to learn **language patterns**, **context understanding**, and **knowledge across diverse topics**. Modern AI chat tools can help with **writing assistance**, **problem solving**, **learning support**, **creative tasks**, and **professional workflows**. The technology behind **AI conversational systems** continues to evolve rapidly, offering increasingly sophisticated **natural language processing** capabilities. Learn more about [conversational AI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Conversational_AI) and [large language models](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Large_language_model).
seo.howToTitle: How to use the AI Chat tool?
howToSteps: **Get a free API key** from Google AI Studio (60 requests per minute)
**Save the API key** - it's stored locally in your browser for security
**Start chatting** by typing your question or message in the input field
**Export conversations** or clear chat history as needed
seo.useCasesTitle: Common use cases for AI chat
useCases: **Writing assistance** - brainstorm ideas, improve grammar, and enhance creativity
**Learning support** - explain complex topics, answer questions, and provide tutoring
**Professional help** - draft emails, create presentations, and solve business problems
**Creative projects** - generate stories, poetry, scripts, and marketing content
**Technical support** - debug code, explain algorithms, and provide programming guidance

faq.question: How accurate and reliable are AI chat responses?
faq.answer: AI chat systems are generally **very capable** but can occasionally produce **incorrect information**. Always **verify important facts** from **reliable sources**. For **critical decisions** or **professional use**, consult **human experts** or **official documentation**.

faq.question: Is my conversation data private and secure?
faq.answer: Yes! The tool uses your **own API key** from Google AI Studio, ensuring your conversations **never go through our servers**. All **processing happens directly** between your browser and Google's AI service, maintaining **complete privacy and security**.

faq.question: What are the limitations of AI chat?
faq.answer: AI chat has **knowledge limitations** (cutoff dates), can **hallucinate information**, and may **struggle with very recent events**. It's **excellent for general assistance** but shouldn't replace **professional consultation** for **medical, legal, or financial matters**.
